scripts.format: npx prettier . --write --ignore-path .prettierignore; cd core; uv run ruff format
scripts.typecheck: cd web; npm run typecheck; cd ../core; uv run ty check
scripts.supabase:db-diff: npm run supabase:start; npx supabase db diff -f latest
scripts.dev: npm run supabase:start; docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --no-recreate --build --watch
scripts.dev:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down; npm run supabase:stop
scripts.dev:clean: rm -rf node_modules; cd web; rm -rf node_modules; sudo rm -rf .next; cd ../core; rm -rf .venv
scripts.dev:install: npm install; cd web; npm install; cd ../core; uv sync
